question: Which Indian player was named as the captain of ESPNCricinfo's ODI and T20 teams of the decade?
explanation: Former Indian cricket team captain, Mahendra Singh Dhoni was selected as the captain of both the ESPNCricinfo\'s ODI and T20 teams of the decade. The present skipper Virat Kohli was selected as the captain of ESPNCricinfo\'s Test team of the decade, while he found place in all the three formats. Famous Indian batsman Rohit Sharma was included in the ODI team of the decade, while spinner R Ashwin found place in the test team. Bumrah was the only bowler to be placed in the T20 list.
